hanzi-su-wiki:
濯

Значения

Стирать, полоскать

Мнемоника

  • Фазан (птица 隹 с красивыми перьями 彐彐) сохраняет яркость перьев за счёт купаний в воде 氵.

  • "Птицы идут стирать одежду и поют "piyo-piyo" (ピヨ)."
purpleculture_pinyin:
zhào
variant of 棹
вариант 棹

zhuó
to wash; to cleanse of evil
мыть; очистить от зла
rtega_mnemonic:
濯濯RSwash out, rinse, cleanse
  • pheasants 翟 washing their feathers in water 氵
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 隹 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
洗濯 [ xǐ zhuó ]: to wash; to cleanse; to launder
濯濯 [ zhuó zhuó ]: bare and bald (of mountains); bright and brilliant; fat and sleek
浣濯 [ huàn zhuó ]: to wash; to rinse
童山濯濯 [ tóng shān zhuó zhuó ]: treeless hill; (fig.) bald head
灌濯 [ guàn zhuó ]: to wash; to rinse
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 翟 [ dí ] long-tailed pheasant; plume; surname
heisig_constituent: laundry, water, water droplets, water pistol, futon, feathers, wings, turkey
koohiiStory1: At the laundry you stuff your large futon (made from turkey feathers) in the machine, thereby causing it to break -- as shown by the water spurting out the side.
koohiiStory2: When turkeys do the laundry, they put their feathers in water (they don´t have clothes).
jp_example_words:
濯ぐ(すすぐ): to rinse, to wash out
洗濯(せんたく): washing, laundry
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You need to throw your two wolverines and your turkey into the oncoming tsunami if you want to wash them at the same time. It's the only way you can get them clean at once without the wolverines fighting over the turkey and somebody getting hurt. The tsunami is big enough to wash them all before anything bad happens.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine the tsunami coming toward you. Two wolverines in one hand and a turkey in the other. You're gonna wash them so good they'll never get dirty again.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Once they're nice and washed you need to subdue them by poking each of them with a tack (たく). The tack has special sleeping medicine on it, so once they're nice and clean you can put them back in their cages without them trying to eat each other.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: If you want to wash your animals make sure to have your special tack ready. The tsunami will recede pretty fast so get it out!
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the little bird gives two yos (翟) as he uses the water (氵) for laundry
humanum_full_description_en:
"濯" means cleansing, "Shuowen": "Zuo, 𤃬 also. From the water, Di Sheng."

The ancients often used " Zuo " to mean washing feet, "Mencius. "Li Lou Shang": "Youruzi's song said: "The water of the Canglang is clear, so you can suffocate me; the water of the Canglang is turbid, you can lick my feet.""

The meaning of the words in the bronze inscriptions is unknown. Youzhuoge: "Youzhuoge", "Youzhuo" is suspected to be an official name or a place name.
humanum_short_description_en: Jia Jin inscription starts from the province of " water " and sounds " di ". The original meaning is washing.
humanum_full_description:
「濯」表示清洗，《說文》：「濯，𤃬也。从水，翟聲。」

　　古人常用「濯」表示洗足，《孟子．離婁上》：「有孺子歌曰：『滄浪之水清兮，可以濯我纓；滄浪之水濁兮，可以濯我足。』」

　　金文詞義不詳，右濯戈：「右濯戈」，「右濯」疑為官名或地名。
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「水」省，「翟」聲。本義是洗滌。

濯ぐ(すすぐ): to rinse, to wash out
洗濯(せんたく): washing, laundry

「 濯 」表示清洗，《說文》：「濯，𤃬也。从水，翟聲。」 古人常用「 濯 」表示洗足，《孟子．離婁上》：「有孺子歌曰：『滄浪之水清兮，可以濯我纓；滄浪之水濁兮，可以濯我足。』」 金文詞義不詳，右濯戈：「右濯戈」，「右濯」疑為官名或地名。
" 濯" means cleansing, "Shuowen": "Zuo, 𤃬 also. From the water, Di Sheng." The ancients often used " Zuo" to mean washing feet, "Mencius. "Li Lou Shang": "Youruzi's song said: "The water of the Canglang is clear, so you can suffocate me; the water of the Canglang is turbid, you can lick my feet."" The meaning of the words in the bronze inscriptions is unknown. Youzhuoge: "Youzhuoge", "Youzhuo" is suspected to be an official name or a place name.

濯字的基本解释

濯
zhuó
洗：濯足。
〔濯濯〕形容山无草木，光秃秃的，如“濯濯童山”。
祓除罪恶。

濯
zhào
古通“棹”。

濯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhuó］
［《廣韻》直角切，入覺，澄。］
［《廣韻》直教切，去效，澄。］
(1)洗涤。
(2)清洗；祛除。
(3)大；盛大。
(4)洗沐后的脏水。参见“濡濯”。
(5)祧。远祖庙。
[②]［zhuó］
［《集韻》仕角切，入覺，崇。］
见“濯2濯”、“濯2秀”。
[③]［zhào］
［《廣韻》直教切，去效，澄。］
通“櫂1”。
船桨。

濯字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　濯； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页657第15
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?直角切，音濁。【說文】?也。【詩·大雅】可以濯罍。【傳】濯，滌也。【儀禮·特牲饋食禮】反告濯具。【註】濯，漑也。　又洗心亦曰洒濯。【左傳·襄二十一年】洒濯其心。　又【爾雅·釋詁】濯，大也。【詩·大雅】王公伊濯。　又光明也。【詩·大雅】鉤膺濯濯。　又【博雅】濯濯，肥也。一曰娛遊也。【詩·大雅】麀鹿濯濯。　又山無草木之貌。【孟子】是以若彼濯濯也。　又飮也。【禮·少儀疏】將飮之，而跪之，曰賜濯。濯，猶飮也。　又湖名。【廣輿記】濯湖，在江西瑞州府新昌縣。　又【集韻】式灼切，音爍。水貌。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?直敎切，音棹。【博雅】潲濯，滫也。一曰浣衣。　又同櫂。【前漢·元后傳】輯濯越歌。【註】濯，與櫂同。　又【韻補】叶㕑玉切，音逐。【陶潛詩】洋洋平津，乃漱乃濯。邈邈遐景，載欣載矚。

Name meaning
wash.
zhuó, zhào
I, zhuó
1) мыть; стирать
2) перен. вымести; очистить
3) большой, великий
4) грязная вода после мытья
5) храм далеким предкам
II, zhuó
чистый; прекрасный
III, zhào
вм. 櫂 (весло, идти на веслах)

濯

Значения

Стирать, полоскать

Мнемоника

  • Фазан (птица 隹 с красивыми перьями 彐彐) сохраняет яркость перьев за счёт купаний в воде 氵.

  • "Птицы идут стирать одежду и поют "piyo-piyo" (ピヨ)."
Radicals: 氵, ヨ, 隹  (tsunami, wolverine, turkey)
Meaning Mnemonic
You need to throw your two wolverines and your turkey into the oncoming tsunami if you want to wash them at the same time. It's the only way you can get them clean at once without the wolverines fighting over the turkey and somebody getting hurt. The tsunami is big enough to wash them all before anything bad happens.
Imagine the tsunami coming toward you. Two wolverines in one hand and a turkey in the other. You're gonna wash them so good they'll never get dirty again.
Reading Mnemonic
Once they're nice and washed you need to subdue them by poking each of them with a tack (たく). The tack has special sleeping medicine on it, so once they're nice and clean you can put them back in their cages without them trying to eat each other.
If you want to wash your animals make sure to have your special tack ready. The tsunami will recede pretty fast so get it out!
